1010110110011000 0101010111001001 0 -> sum: 0000001101100001, cout: 1
1010111000011001 0101110100000100 1 -> sum: 0000101100011110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
